# Ignore NuGet Packages folder
packages/
*.nupkg
*.nuspec
*.snupkg

# Ignore build directories
bin/
obj/

# Ignore user-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.userprefs
*.sln.docstates

# Ignore WebForms generated files
**/Generated_Code/

# Ignore configuration files
appsettings*.json

# Ignore publish output
publish/
.vscode/
.vs/

# Ignore IDE-specific folders
.idea/
*.csproj.user

# Ignore Visual Studio working folder
.vscode/

# Ignore Rider working folder
.idea/

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp

# Ignore log files
*.log

# Ignore deployment files
*.publishsettings
.deploy/

# Ignore Resharper files
_ReSharper*/
